Projects.Name: Alpaca Trading Bot
Projects.Description: Algorithmic trading bot in Node.js made to trade on the live market using data from Alpaca and IEX. Made with a lagging indicator and momentum based strategy.

Projects.Name: Fish Spot Application
Projects.Description: A full stack web application for allowing users to upload fishing spots and then review them respectively with a fully fledged login system. Backend made with Node.js and Database with MySQL with a focus on effecient transactions. Along with a front end made with React and Chakra UI.

Projects.Name: AzeemEdu
Projects.Description: A web application made to serve as a marketing website for a small tutoring business. Made with React and was deployed on Google's Firebase

Projects.Name: InterVR
Projects.Description: An Unity based application designed to simulate an interviewing situation with the help of Oculus Rift. The application checks what percent of the user's answer is filled with filler words and displays the statistics at the very end.

Projects.Name: Lindenmayer system Fractal Tree
Projects.Description: Application made in C# that creates a fractal tree using instructions that are recursively generated by the program.
